snippet: Judge Brendan L. Shannon of Federal Bankruptcy Court cleared the way for RadioShack to sell 1,740 of its locations to Standard General, a hedge fund.
abstract: Federal Bankruptcy Judge Brendan L Shannon gives go-ahead to plan that would preserve roughly 1,700 Radio Shack stores by selling them to hedge fund Standard General; decision sidelines higher cash bid by creditor Salus Capital Partners and allied liquidators.
lead_paragraph: Judge Brendan L. Shannon of Federal Bankruptcy Court cleared the way for RadioShack to sell 1,740 of its locations to Standard General, a hedge fund.

headline.main: Plan to Keep 1,700 RadioShack Stores Open Is Approved
headline.print_headline: Hedge Fund Plan to Keep 1,700 RadioShack Stores Open Is Approved
